title: The Galileo List
author: VD
content_html:
Won’t the SFWA be proud to have made the list of organizations purging the politically correct? Their purge of me is number 75 on it, which is a nice synchronicity, since when my books were still being published by Hinterlands there, Amazon listed me as the #76 most popular science fiction writer.

  • 17-MAR-2013: ‘Dongle-Gate’, dongle-joker-geeks purged.
  • 20-MAR-2013: Steven Landsburg gets two-minutes-hated for a thought experiment.
  • 03-APR-2013: Terri Proud purged from Arizona VA
  • 10-MAY-2013: Jason Richwine purged from Heritage
  • 17-MAY-2013: Paula Deen purged.
  • 30-MAY-2013: Gordon Gee purged from Ohio State University (he’s going to West Virginia now)
  • 04-JUN-2013: Geoffrey Miller two-minutes-hated for ‘fat shaming’.
  • 05-JUN-2013: Nissim Yeshaya purged from Israel Court.
  • 07-JUN-2013: April Sims purged from Dallas Police Dept.
  • 20-JUN-2013: Mike Krahulik gets two-minutes-hated for ‘transphobia’.
  • 03-JUL-2013: Aaryn Gries purged from Zephyr Talent.
  • 12-JULY-2013: Orson Scott Card threatened with Ender’s Game boycott.  (See also his mothballed Superman project)
  • 20-JULY-2013: Ron Unz purged from The American Conservative for this.
  • 08-AUG-2013: Richard Dawkins gets a taste of the Zeitgeist.
  • 14-AUG-2013: Vox Day purged from Science Fiction Writers of America.
